document.full_text: twin brothers who accused facebook inc and its founder mark zuckerberg of stealing their idea for the social networking website lost their bid to have a federal appeals court void a settlement of their claims.
document.title: winklevoss twins lose bid to reopen facebook case
lines_and_colors: twin brothers who accused facebook inc and its founder mark zuckerberg of stealing their idea for the social networking website lost their bid to have a federal appeals court void a settlement of their claims.
